description:
It’s one thing if you think we should have an open border but it’s astonishing that leftists will defend the rights of foreign nationals to commit crimes in this country. And it’s not surprising that AOC is having another one of her fits, as she cannot comprehend why we need laws to hold people accountable.

The Senate has passed a bill that would require authorities to detain migrants accused of violent and theft-related crimes. And anyone in Congress who has a problem with this should automatically be disqualified from serving office but we no longer live in a sane society.

AOC is melting down over detaining illegals who commit crimes. Tells you everything you need to know about her priorities.pic.twitter.com/NeNwQZSNAe

title: Watch: AOC has yet ANOTHER meltdown this week, this time over illegals being deported for violent crimes (she's against it)

description:

WEF leaders have admitted they lost the fight against the unwoke mob, and their reality of forced bug-eating may no longer be realized.

The WEF has admitted defeat.

"Trump has done something that no one else has done."

'Trump has won, and we have lost.' pic.twitter.com/sJubbKVZSc
— Gunther Eagleman™ (@GuntherEagleman) January 22, 2025
title: So. Much. Winning! Globalists admit they lost to Donald Trump, forced to call him "the greatest comeback in political history”

description:
The fact that leftists cannot even comprehend their lack of logic proves how irrational everything they believe is. So while they claim there are more than two genders, they also have trouble actually admitting it, as it’s nothing more than a deranged law.

A reporter asks Canadian Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre what he thought about the Trump admission declaring biological facts will be national policy. And let’s just say, things got a bit awkward, as the reporter had to admit that he was a man.

Reporter asks Pierre Poilievre if he will join Trump in declaring there is only male and female.

Poilievre: “I am not aware of any other genders than men and women.”

🔥🔥🔥https://t.co/9yJWLHtDz2
— Libs of TikTo
title: Watch: Woke reporter tries playing the pronoun game with Pierre Poilievre, it ends very badly for him

description:
Mark Zuckerberg. I still don't trust him. The dude has cost me way too much money over the years, leading the censorship wing of the Democrat Party. He has A LOT more sins to atone for before we believe he is on board with the "cultural shift" back to free speech. As long as there is a single blue-haired freak on Facebook pressing buttons and writing algorithms to throttle any viewpoint they don't like, Zuck doesn't get to sit with us. Okay? Okay.

I think we can all appreciate him liking boobs as much as the rest of us. But, my man, you should know we can all see your likes on Instagram. Yes, YOUR Instagram that you own.

In fairness to Zuckerberg, his transformation into a real boy has slowly happened over time.
title: Confirmed boob guy Mark Zuckerberg busted thirsting after Jeff Bezos's girl AGAIN, forgets how Instagram (which he owns) works
